result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Everett R Weymier

defendant.name: Weymier, Everett R
defendant.address: 11880 W Janesville Rd Apt 29, Hales Corners, WI 53130

records.addlTxt: Court contacted by the State to cancel the defendants midpoint review of the DPA due to defendants compliance in the program. Court scheduled final review hearing for the DPA.

Defendant Everett R Weymier in court with attorney Kirk D Henley.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Everett R Weymier appeared by video means with Attorney.
The parties have agreed to a deferred judgment agreement.
The defendant was advised of his constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, pled GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum to Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty but WITHHELD entry of Judgment of Conviction.  The court approved the Deferred Prosecution Agreement and ordered the case transferred to Judge Davis, Branch 21 for a review hearing.
Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to branch 17, Judge Carolina Stark, in Room 400 of the Courthouse.  Review hearing scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
ADDENDUM to Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights, filed.

Defendant Everett R Weymier in court with attorney Kirk D Henley.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense recently received the DPA and requests additional time to review.   Court ordered case adjourned for deferred prosecution agreement hearing in Branch 37.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Everett R Weymier in court with attorney Kirk D Henley.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Everett R Weymier appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Defnese counsel advises Court that defendant needs a TADD evaluation and requests a DPA Hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 37.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 034639,
Payable Number: 998933,
Receipt Number: 22RP014641,
Amount: $20.00

The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription taken in a manner and fashion as prescribed.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Everett R Weymier in court.  Patrick T. Franken appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible.  
The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br. 37.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Everett R Weymier
Current: 11880 W Janesville Rd Apt 29, Hales Corners, WI 53130 United States  (Effective: 03-23-2022)
Prior: 12181 West Layton Avenue, Greenfield, WI 53228
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 3/23/22 @ 2p
